showcase websites

Characteristics

Used to provide background information about a business, organization, or service. Design is very important and content is static, i.e. does not change every day. Must reflect the organization values and respect its image.

Examples

These Silex themes are convenient for such sites, and they are provided for free on Silex Labs exchange platform

Themes Design by Leo, Kathleen, Solvejg, Pascal, Isabelle, Pol...

Software and skills involved

Use of Silex editor and Flash animation.

Average time needed

Between 2 days and 2 weeks
Entrepreneurs and companies

Capitalize on the versatility of your teams and to avoid need of web experts for some of your multimedia projects.With Silex you will be able to streamline the production showcase web sites, e-commerce sites, online catalogs, web magazines, web applications . Silex can also be used as a rapid prototyping tool.And here are the key benefits of Silex for your company : * the workflow * cross media * cross canalWith one single tool, and with the same team, the same publication can be released for : * points of sale, * touch screen applications, * CD-R with online and offline capabilities, * desktop applications - use third party product such as AIR, XUL, mdm zinc, mProjector... * widgets distribution systems like yahoo widgets, windows gadgets, mac os widgets, open social widgets for social network sites, blogs embeded mini-sites and ads...Here are the different types of workflow you will need in function can use depending on the product you have sold are building. The creative part of the artistic director, the sell and the customer management are not included, this is only the executive part of the work.

Capitalize on the versatility of your teams and to avoid need of web experts for some of your multimedia projects.

With Silex you will be able to streamline the production showcase web sites, e-commerce sites, online catalogs, web magazines, web applications . Silex can also be used as a rapid prototyping tool.

And here are the key benefits of Silex for your company :

* the workflow

* cross media

* cross canal

With one single tool, and with the same team, the same publication can be released for :

* points of sale,

* touch screen applications,

* CD-R with online and offline capabilities,

* desktop applications - use third party product such as AIR, XUL, mdm zinc, mProjector...

* widgets distribution systems like yahoo widgets, windows gadgets, mac os widgets, open social widgets for social network sites, blogs embeded mini-sites and ads...

Here are the different types of workflow you will need in function can use depending on the product you have sold are building. The creative part of the artistic director, the sell and the customer management are not included, this is only the executive part of the work.

Web apps, desktop applications, points of sell (POS), touch screens and widgetsCharacteristicsAn emerging strategy for application software companies is to provide web access to software previously distributed as local applications. With Silex you can develop such products or do prototyping for it, without heavy development skills.Examples* Silex yahoo widget and Silex Windows7 gadget ( lien plateforme, demander a jeremie ) * The manager of Silex is a web app made with Silex. It handles webservice calls, manage files, read and write to files (.ini, .php, .txt, .xml) (mettre captures d ecran )* The installation application for Evolis printers is a Silex application, auto executable, no installation is needed, mac and PC versions, read from the Evolis product databases, 11 languages supported. Online version of the CD-R application : http://hoyau.info/demos/cd_multi and http://hoyau.info/demos/cd-r_badgy/* Touch screen point of sell for Vodaphone, deployed in 500 shops in Belgium. Daily updated content and structure, the data is read from local source and mixed with data coming from the online product database of Vodaphone. Hundreds of telephones and budget plans are presented in different contexts depending on the shop location and the language configuration of the application. Online version of the POS: http://hoyau.info/demos/proximus/Software and skills involvedUse of Silex editor and Flash animation. Webmaster skills are often needed, e.g. manipulation of XML data, RSS feeds in Silex, handle language files. An ActionScript developper is required to publish the applicaiton using third party products such as AIR or Zinc. But most of the work is done by the designer.Average time neededBetween 15 days and 2 month

Web apps, desktop applications, points of sell (POS), touch screens and widgets

Characteristics

An emerging strategy for application software companies is to provide web access to software previously distributed as local applications. With Silex you can develop such products or do prototyping for it, without heavy development skills.

Examples

* Silex yahoo widget and Silex Windows7 gadget ( lien plateforme, demander a jeremie ) * The manager of Silex is a web app made with Silex. It handles webservice calls, manage files, read and write to files (.ini, .php, .txt, .xml) (mettre captures d ecran )

* The installation application for Evolis printers is a Silex application, auto executable, no installation is needed, mac and PC versions, read from the Evolis product databases, 11 languages supported. Online version of the CD-R application : http://hoyau.info/demos/cd_multi and http://hoyau.info/demos/cd-r_badgy/

* Touch screen point of sell for Vodaphone, deployed in 500 shops in Belgium. Daily updated content and structure, the data is read from local source and mixed with data coming from the online product database of Vodaphone. Hundreds of telephones and budget plans are presented in different contexts depending on the shop location and the language configuration of the application. Online version of the POS: http://hoyau.info/demos/proximus/

Software and skills involved

Use of Silex editor and Flash animation. Webmaster skills are often needed, e.g. manipulation of XML data, RSS feeds in Silex, handle language files. An ActionScript developper is required to publish the applicaiton using third party products such as AIR or Zinc. But most of the work is done by the designer.

Average time needed

Between 15 days and 2 month

Web magazines and online catalogsCharacteristicsPresents a catalog of products, in an elegant and interactive maner.Examples* we are not allowed to disclose the links to these sites for now : we wait the agreement of the clients who used Silex for such sites.Software and skills involvedUse of Silex editor and Flash animation. For some advanced components there may be some webmaster skills needed, e.g. manipulation of XML data, RSS feeds in Silex. If you need really complex visual components, an ActionScript developper may be required at some point, but he will not need to enter the code of Silex, he will use the APIs in order to interact with the well documented framework.Average time neededBetween 5 and 15 days

Web magazines and online catalogs

Characteristics

Presents a catalog of products, in an elegant and interactive maner.

Examples

* we are not allowed to disclose the links to these sites for now : we wait the agreement of the clients who used Silex for such sites.

Software and skills involved

Use of Silex editor and Flash animation. For some advanced components there may be some webmaster skills needed, e.g. manipulation of XML data, RSS feeds in Silex. If you need really complex visual components, an ActionScript developper may be required at some point, but he will not need to enter the code of Silex, he will use the APIs in order to interact with the well documented framework.

Average time needed

Between 5 and 15 days
